name: spond-payment-reporting
description: MCP server for Spond payment reporting and member queries

tools.name: get_member_payment_summary
tools.description: Get payment summary for a specific club member. Returns total amount owed, outstanding payments count, and breakdown by payment type.

member_name.description: Name of the member to look up (case-insensitive partial match)

tools.name: get_all_outstanding_payments
tools.description: Get all outstanding payments for the club, optionally filtered by payment title

title_filter.description: Optional filter for payment titles (e.g., 'Match Fee', '2025')

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_payment_statistics
tools.description: Get statistics about outstanding payments including total amounts, member counts, and payment type breakdowns

tools.name: search_members
tools.description: Search for club members by name to find the correct member name for other queries

examples.query: How much does John owe in match fees?
Show me all outstanding 2025 match fees
What are the overall payment statistics?
